VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (02) Store & Monetization
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Investigate the new Windows Store, a single store for all of the different types of Windows apps, and explore some of the opportunities for monetization, such as advertising and in-app purchases. [00:

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (03) XAML Controls
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Look at how XAML (both WPF and WinRT XAML) is being used and embraced around the world, and investigate how XAML controls are used in a UWP app to accomplish your Windows 10 design considerations. [00

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (04) XAML Data Binding
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Explore data binding within a XAML-based UWP app, starting out with basic data binding and then looking into some new features and techniques, like compiled binding, available with Visual Studio 2015.

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (05) XAML Performance
Author: JeffKoch
Description: See how to improve the performance of your app UI by taking advantage of XAML features, like progressive rendering and deferred loading. [01:11] - What is performance?[08:04] - Progressive rendering[1

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (06) Adaptive Design
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Examine the Microsoft design language, design principles for Windows 10, and how Windows makes design easier for developers with adaptive controls. See how to approach designing your own UWP apps. [02

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (07) Adaptive UI
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Move from a discussion of UWP design to an investigation of adaptive UI implementation. Review the adaptive UI story for Windows 10 UWP apps, and then explore View States, Adaptive Triggers, and more.

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (08) Adaptive Code
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Dig deeper into the code that supports the ability of UWP apps to run on any Windows 10 device and to provide a great user experience. Look at the Platform Extension SDKs and then move to adaptive cod

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (09) File Management
Author: JeffKoch
Description: See how to implement file management using the available local folders. Find out more about roaming, and then look at how to access other storage folders/locations, using file pickers. [00:36] - Where

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (10) SQLite Local Database
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Check out local database options that are available to UWP app developers, and learn why you might want to use them. Look into how to implement database transactions, relations, and constraints. [09:5

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (11) App to App Communication
Author: JeffKoch
Description: See how app-to-app communication will work in your UWP apps. Get some context to how this worked in Windows 8.1, and then review URI activation, sending files, query URI support, and App Services. [01

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (12) Localizing Your App
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Explore the importance of localizing your apps, and then hear how to implement localization of text and graphics. Learn how to install and use the Multilingual Toolkit. [01:14] - Locaization[16:44] -

VideoTitle: A Developer's Guide to Windows 10: (13) Application Lifecycle
Author: JeffKoch
Description: Take a look at the lifecycle of a Windows 10 UWP app. Cover the basics of suspension, resuming, and termination, and then see how to handle lifecycle events and how to request extended execution. [00:
